title: "Dynamic preference" after playing one game grouped as 5.
body: How exactly does this happen, I played a game when my friends needed a fifth person, and we won, and now I have dynamic preference as my "emblem"

replies.body:
The reason why you're seeing the Dynamic preference is because you've won a lot of ranked games with friends in the last 25 wins. If you'd like to rep a solo emblem, most of the last 25 wins in ranked must have been played solo. You can find more about the system in our [Ranked Emblems FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems)

Let me know if you have any questions.
